name: ChoreMaster
0:
”Alexa open chore master”
”Alexa give me a chore from chore master”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chore master
des: Stop fighting with your kids when there are chores to hand out. Ask for a random chore and make it a fun game to deliver the bad news.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
